de.lambeck.pned.gui.statusBar

Class StatusBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • de.lambeck.pned.gui.statusBar.StatusBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInfo_DrawingAreaSize, IInfo_MousePos, IInfo_SelectionRangeSize, IInfo_Status, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class StatusBar
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements IInfo_MousePos, IInfo_SelectionRangeSize, IInfo_DrawingAreaSize, IInfo_Status
    Implements the status bar for the Petri net editor.

    Left side:
    - 3 fixed-size areas for pre-defined information:
      - Mouse position
      - Size of the selection range
      - Size of the drawing area

    Right side:
    - Variable-length status message area
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
